name: Age of Empires 2 Replay File
summary: Recording of a game from Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings, a real-time strategy game developed by Microsoft; saves a complete recording of a campaign played by the user; can be played back in the Age of Empires II program.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Age of Empires 2: The Age of Kings
